summary: What flavor of milkshake do you think each member of the Good Hair Crew likes to get at the Spoon?
question: What flavor of milkshake do you think each member of the Good Hair Crew likes to get at the Spoon?
answer:
I really like this question!!

Andi- Strawberry or Cookies and Cream

Buffy- Chocolate, i’m not quite sure for her?

Cyrus- Oreo maybe?? I have a headcanon that he is like Alex from 13rw and he went through all the milkshake flavors and after he tried every single one he just kept rotating through all of them!

Jonah- Let’s be real this kid is probably super picky and only likes Vanilla (I don’t blame him though Vanilla is really good)

blog.name: mackmeta
blog.title: Meta, Analysis, and Speculation
blog.description: I'm Dave (he/him). I'm a fan of Andi Mack, Riverdale, and Girl Meets World, and other shows and movies. Feel free to send me asks!

summary: What do you think about the new Andi Mack episode names?
question: What do you think about the new Andi Mack episode names?
answer:
I think they’re very likely accurate as the nickandmore twitter account has a good track record. It’s great that it’s coming back so soon but it’s very unlikely that Disney originally intended to have a less than 2 month gap between S2 and S3; most likely the tanking ratings in the summer spooked Disney into airing S3 a few months earlier than planned which was a wise move I think. I’m concerned that they’re airing the eps on Mondays still though; the show did much better in S1 and 2a when it aired on Fridays. I was going to make a post analyzing the ep titles but I’ll just do it here.

Ep 1 : The Boys Are Back

The working title for 3x01 was Wedding Dream and we know that an important part of this ep is the dream turned nightmare Andi or Bex have. The official title is self-explanatory, the boys are back in town. Jonah returns from frisbee camp, Bowie returns from his tour, Ham returns from his trip, and Walker returns as well to get whatever they’re trying to do with Wuffy going. 

As an aside, I think this episode will make even people who don’t care about Cyrus feel bad for him. All the boys are back except TJ and all the female characters will have scenes with their love interests while he’ll be all alone. By the time TJ returns in 3x05 I’d imagine even the most casual of viewers will realize that Disney is stalling Cyrus’ story.

Ep 2: Howling At The Moon Festival

This ep will deal with the Mid-Autumn festival which originated as a harvest and fertility festival that was linked to worship of the moon. It’s a time for families to gather, go moongazing, eat mooncakes, light lanterns, and make wishes. Some brief research shows that the festival is is a time for reuniting families and has also traditionally been a time to celebrate marriages, both resonant themes for the Mack family. I couldn’t find anything about howling at the moon but I trust that the writers did their research.

Bex turned down Bowie at the Lunar New Year in 2x02, maybe in 3x02 Bowie will say yes to her proposal. And I think we know what Andi will be wishing for. The Mid-Autumn festival takes place on September 24th 2018 so even though the timeline since 2x14 hasn’t made any sense it should be fixed after this ep.

Ep 3: It’s A Dilemma 

I’d guess that there’s more than one dilemma in this ep. One will likely involve Buffy deciding whether she should act on her crush with Walker or if she should tell Andi about it. If Bowie hasn’t said yes yet he could be wrestling with the choice or if he has said yes he and Bex could be wrestling with how to move forward with the wedding. Or Jonah could be wrestling with whether to tell Andi about his panic attacks. Could also possibly be Cyrus facing a dilemma of which clothing style to go with. If they’re going to do any set up for Tyrus before TJ returns this would be the earliest ep for it to start I think.

Ep 4: Hole in the Wall

Hole in the wall typically refers to a small low key restaurant or bar. Maybe something to do with Bex and Bowie? I’d imagine if Bowie hasn’t said yes to the marriage yet he will in this ep, I don’t think the show can string out his decision too long. Maybe they want to move in together but can’t afford more than a small hole in the wall. Maybe Cyrus’ wardrobe change will lead him to some small hole in the wall clothing store. This ep doesn’t seem like it will have guest stars so I’d expect it to focus on the GHC and Mack family, probably setting up the dynamics that will carry forward through 3a. If they’re going to give Cyrus any kind of real plot this would be the most likely ep for it to happen as it doesn’t seem like there will be much room for him plot wise in the first 2-3 eps.

reblog.comment:
I think they’re very likely accurate as the nickandmore twitter account has a good track record. It’s great that it’s coming back so soon but it’s very unlikely that Disney originally intended to have a less than 2 month gap between S2 and S3; most likely the tanking ratings in the summer spooked Disney into airing S3 a few months earlier than planned which was a wise move I think. The working title for 3x01 was Wedding Dream and we know that an important part of this ep is the dream turned nightmare Andi or Bex have. The official title is self-explanatory, the boys are back in town. Jonah returns from frisbee camp, Bowie returns from his tour, Ham returns from his trip, and Walker returns as well to get whatever they’re trying to do with Wuffy going. 

As an aside, I think this episode will make even people who don’t care about Cyrus feel bad for him. All the boys are back except TJ and all the female characters will have scenes with their love interests while he’ll be all alone. By the time TJ returns in 3x05 I’d imagine even the most casual of viewers will realize that Disney is stalling Cyrus’ story.

Ep 2: Howling At The Moon Festival

This ep will deal with the Mid-Autumn festival which originated as a harvest and fertility festival that was linked to worship of the moon. It’s a time for families to gather, go moongazing, eat mooncakes, light lanterns, and make wishes. Some brief research shows that the festival is is a time for reuniting families and has also traditionally been a time to celebrate marriages, both resonant themes for the Mack family. I couldn’t find anything about howling at the moon but I trust that the writers did their research.

Bex turned down Bowie at the Lunar New Year in 2x02, maybe in 3x02 Bowie will say yes to her proposal. And I think we know what Andi will be wishing for. The Mid-Autumn festival takes place on September 24th 2018 so even though the timeline since 2x14 hasn’t made any sense it should be fixed after this ep.

Ep 3: It’s A Dilemma 

I’d guess that there’s more than one dilemma in this ep. One will likely involve Buffy deciding whether she should act on her crush with Walker or if she should tell Andi about it. If Bowie hasn’t said yes yet he could be wrestling with the choice or if he has said yes he and Bex could be wrestling with how to move forward with the wedding. Or Jonah could be wrestling with whether to tell Andi about his panic attacks. Could also possibly be Cyrus facing a dilemma of which clothing style to go with. If they’re going to do any set up for Tyrus before TJ returns this would be the earliest ep for it to start I think.

Ep 4: Hole in the Wall

Hole in the wall typically refers to a small low key restaurant or bar. Maybe something to do with Bex and Bowie? I’d imagine if Bowie hasn’t said yes to the marriage yet he will in this ep, I don’t think the show can string out his decision too long. Maybe they want to move in together but can’t afford more than a small hole in the wall. Maybe Cyrus’ wardrobe change will lead him to some small hole in the wall clothing store. This ep doesn’t seem like it will have guest stars so I’d expect it to focus on the GHC and Mack family, probably setting up the dynamics that will carry forward through 3a. If they’re going to give Cyrus any kind of real plot this would be the most likely ep for it to happen as it doesn’t seem like there will be much room for him plot wise in the first 2-3 eps.
trail.content:
I think they’re very likely accurate as the nickandmore twitter account has a good track record. It’s great that it’s coming back so soon but it’s very unlikely that Disney originally intended to have a less than 2 month gap between S2 and S3; most likely the tanking ratings in the summer spooked Disney into airing S3 a few months earlier than planned which was a wise move I think. I’m concerned that they’re airing the eps on Mondays still though; the show did much better in S1 and 2a when it aired on Fridays. I was going to make a post analyzing the ep titles but I’ll just do it here.

Ep 1 : The Boys Are Back

The working title for 3x01 was Wedding Dream and we know that an important part of this ep is the dream turned nightmare Andi or Bex have. The official title is self-explanatory, the boys are back in town. Jonah returns from frisbee camp, Bowie returns from his tour, Ham returns from his trip, and Walker returns as well to get whatever they’re trying to do with Wuffy going. 

As an aside, I think this episode will make even people who don’t care about Cyrus feel bad for him. All the boys are back except TJ and all the female characters will have scenes with their love interests while he’ll be all alone. By the time TJ returns in 3x05 I’d imagine even the most casual of viewers will realize that Disney is stalling Cyrus’ story.

Ep 2: Howling At The Moon Festival

This ep will deal with the Mid-Autumn festival which originated as a harvest and fertility festival that was linked to worship of the moon. It’s a time for families to gather, go moongazing, eat mooncakes, light lanterns, and make wishes. Some brief research shows that the festival is is a time for reuniting families and has also traditionally been a time to celebrate marriages, both resonant themes for the Mack family. I couldn’t find anything about howling at the moon but I trust that the writers did their research.

Bex turned down Bowie at the Lunar New Year in 2x02, maybe in 3x02 Bowie will say yes to her proposal. And I think we know what Andi will be wishing for. The Mid-Autumn festival takes place on September 24th 2018 so even though the timeline since 2x14 hasn’t made any sense it should be fixed after this ep.

Ep 3: It’s A Dilemma 

I’d guess that there’s more than one dilemma in this ep. One will likely involve Buffy deciding whether she should act on her crush with Walker or if she should tell Andi about it. If Bowie hasn’t said yes yet he could be wrestling with the choice or if he has said yes he and Bex could be wrestling with how to move forward with the wedding. Or Jonah could be wrestling with whether to tell Andi about his panic attacks. Could also possibly be Cyrus facing a dilemma of which clothing style to go with. If they’re going to do any set up for Tyrus before TJ returns this would be the earliest ep for it to start I think.

Ep 4: Hole in the Wall

Hole in the wall typically refers to a small low key restaurant or bar. Maybe something to do with Bex and Bowie? I’d imagine if Bowie hasn’t said yes to the marriage yet he will in this ep, I don’t think the show can string out his decision too long. Maybe they want to move in together but can’t afford more than a small hole in the wall. Maybe Cyrus’ wardrobe change will lead him to some small hole in the wall clothing store. This ep doesn’t seem like it will have guest stars so I’d expect it to focus on the GHC and Mack family, probably setting up the dynamics that will carry forward through 3a. If they’re going to give Cyrus any kind of real plot this would be the most likely ep for it to happen as it doesn’t seem like there will be much room for him plot wise in the first 2-3 eps.
